conversation.name: Erich
conversation.text: Well met traveler. Name's Erich, used to be the captain of the fine 'ol ship Lucy back there. Seems we are 'bout to go our separate ways from now on.

option.text: That blasted Foern, decided to overtake 'me ship with guns blazing. Killed off all the crew and left me alive only to suffer... I've heard you've "dealt" with difficult situations before. Would you mind helping me out?
I heard officials are looking for you. Why is really none of my business, but I can get you off this island in good 'ol Lucy if you help me out.
Excellent! Clean out Foern's men aboard the ship and return to me once you're done.

conversation.name: Erich
conversation.text: Ahh, splendid work! 'Was afraid I'd never set foot on 'me ship again. Ready to set sail?

option.text: Time's a wastin', get to the bridge of the ship and we'll set sail!
